channel.title: Need help with making a command
channel.description: how do i make a command which show me commands?like ::commands and then pop up a window which show me available player,mod,admin and owner commands?

item.title: Need help with making a command
item.dc:creator: @Rocky2k10 Rocky2k10
item.description:
@Rocky2k10 wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“commands”)&& playerRights >= 0){
sendQuest(“SERVER NAME Commands¬!”, 8144);
clearQuestInterface();
sendQuest(“TEXT HERE”, 8147);
sendQuest(“TEXT HERE”, 8148);
sendQuest(“TEXT HERE”, 8149);
sendQuest(“TEXT HERE”, 8150);
sendQuest(“TEXT HERE”, 8151);
sendQuest(“TEXT HERE”, 8152);
sendQuestSomething(8143);
showInterface(8134);
flushOutStream();
}
here is a quick one i made for you… could of done better…

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with making a command
item.dc:creator: @_Haste1 #Haste
item.description:
@_Haste1 wrote:

[quote=“Dastan_, post:3, topic:364761”]Simply make a command which pops up with an interface.

And add the text to it.[/quote]

Easy as a pie.
